   20: -module(epp_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   23: 
   24: -export([rec_1/1, include_local/1, predef_mac/1,
   25: 	 upcase_mac_1/1, upcase_mac_2/1,
   26: 	 variable_1/1, otp_4870/1, otp_4871/1, otp_5362/1,
   27:          pmod/1, not_circular/1, skip_header/1, otp_6277/1, gh_4995/1, otp_7702/1,
   28:          otp_8130/1, overload_mac/1, otp_8388/1, otp_8470/1,
   29:          otp_8562/1, otp_8665/1, otp_8911/1, otp_10302/1, otp_10820/1,
   30:          otp_11728/1, encoding/1, extends/1,  function_macro/1,
   31: 	 test_error/1, test_warning/1, otp_14285/1,
   32: 	 test_if/1,source_name/1,otp_16978/1,otp_16824/1,scan_file/1,file_macro/1,
   33:          triple_quotes_warning/1,
   34:    deterministic_include/1, nondeterministic_include/1]).
   35: 
   36: -export([epp_parse_erl_form/2]).
   37: 
   38: %%
   39: %% Define to run outside of test server
   40: %%
   41: %%-define(STANDALONE,1).
   42: 
   43: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   44: -compile(export_all).
   45: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   46: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   47: %% -define(t, test_server).
   48: -define(t, io).
   49: config(priv_dir, _) ->
   50:     filename:absname("./epp_SUITE_priv");
   51: config(data_dir, _) ->
   52:     filename:absname("./epp_SUITE_data").
   53: -else.
   54: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   55: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   56: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   57: 
   58: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   62:     ok.
   63: -endif.
   64: 
   65: suite() ->
   66:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   67:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   68: 
   69: all() ->
   70:     [rec_1, {group, upcase_mac}, include_local, predef_mac,
   71:      {group, variable}, otp_4870, otp_4871, otp_5362, pmod,
   72:      not_circular, skip_header, otp_6277, gh_4995, otp_7702, otp_8130,
   73:      overload_mac, otp_8388, otp_8470, otp_8562,
   74:      otp_8665, otp_8911, otp_10302, otp_10820, otp_11728,
   75:      encoding, extends, function_macro, test_error, test_warning,
   76:      otp_14285, test_if, source_name, otp_16978, otp_16824, scan_file, file_macro,
   77:      triple_quotes_warning,
   78:      deterministic_include, nondeterministic_include].
   79: 
   80: groups() ->
   81:     [{upcase_mac, [], [upcase_mac_1, upcase_mac_2]},
   82:      {variable, [], [variable_1]}].
   83: 
   84: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   91:     Config.
   92: 
   93: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   94:     Config.
   95: 
   96: %% Recursive macros hang or crash epp (OTP-1398).
   97: rec_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   98:     File = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "mac.erl"),
   99:     {ok, List} = epp_parse_file(File, [], []),
  100:     %% we should encounter errors
  101:     {value, _} = lists:keysearch(error, 1, List),
  102:     check_errors(List),
  103:     ok.
  104: 
  105: include_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  106:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  107:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "include_local.erl"),
  108:     FooHrl = filename:join([DataDir,"include","foo.hrl"]),
  109:     BarHrl = filename:join([DataDir,"include","bar.hrl"]),
  110:     %% include_local.erl includes include/foo.hrl which
  111:     %% includes bar.hrl (also in include/) without requiring
  112:     %% any additional include path, and overriding any file
  113:     %% of the same name that the path points to
  114:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [DataDir], []),
  115:     {value, {attribute,_,a,{true,true}}} =
  116: 	lists:keysearch(a,3,List),
  117:     [{File,1},{FooHrl,1},{BarHrl,1},{FooHrl,5},{File,5}] =
  118:         [ FileLine || {attribute,_,file,FileLine} <- List ],
  119:     ok.
  120: 
  121: file_macro(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  122:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  123:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "file_macro.erl"),
  124:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [{includes, [DataDir]},
  125:                                        {source_name, "Other source"}]),
  126:     %% Both attribute a and b are defined as ?FILE, they should be the same
  127:     {attribute,_,a,FileA} = lists:keyfind(a, 3, List),
  128:     {attribute,_,b,FileB} = lists:keyfind(b, 3, List),
  129:     "Other source" = FileA = FileB,
  130:     ok.
  131: 
  132: deterministic_include(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  133:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  134:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "deterministic_include.erl"),
  135:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [{includes, [DataDir]},
  136:                                        {deterministic, true},
  137:                                        {source_name, "deterministic_include.erl"}]),
  138: 
  139:     %% In deterministic mode, only basenames, rather than full paths, should
  140:     %% be written to the -file() attributes resulting from -include and -include_lib
  141:     ?assert(lists:any(fun
  142:                        ({attribute,_Anno,file,{"baz.hrl",_Line}}) -> true;
  143:                        (_) -> false
  144:                      end,
  145:                      List),
  146:             "Expected a basename in the -file attribute resulting from " ++
  147:             "including baz.hrl in deterministic mode."),
  148:     ?assert(lists:any(fun
  149:                        ({attribute,_Anno,file,{"file.hrl",_Line}}) -> true;
  150:                        (_) -> false
  151:                      end,
  152:                      List),
  153:             "Expected a basename in the -file attribute resulting from " ++
  154:             "including file.hrl in deterministic mode."),
  155:     ok.
  156: 
  157: nondeterministic_include(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  159:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "deterministic_include.erl"),
  160:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [{includes, [DataDir]},
  161:                                        {source_name, "deterministic_include.erl"}]),
  162: 
  163:     %% Outside of deterministic mode, full paths, should be written to
  164:     %% the -file() attributes resulting from -include and -include_lib
  165:     %% to make debugging easier.
  166:     %% We don't try to assume what the full absolute path will be in the
  167:     %% unit test, since that can depend on the environment and how the
  168:     %% test is executed. Instead, we just look for whether there is
  169:     %% the parent directory along with the basename at least.
  170:     IncludeAbsolutePathSuffix = filename:join("include","baz.hrl"),
  171:     ?assert(lists:any(fun
  172:                        ({attribute,_Anno,file,{IncludePath,_Line}}) ->
  173:                          lists:suffix(IncludeAbsolutePathSuffix,IncludePath);
  174:                        (_) -> false
  175:                      end,
  176:                      List),
  177:             "Expected an absolute in the -file attribute resulting from " ++
  178:             "including baz.hrl outside of deterministic mode."),
  179:     IncludeLibAbsolutePathSuffix = filename:join("include","file.hrl"),
  180:     ?assert(lists:any(fun
  181:                        ({attribute,_Anno,file,{IncludePath,_line}}) ->
  182:                          lists:suffix(IncludeLibAbsolutePathSuffix,IncludePath);
  183:                        (_) -> false
  184:                      end,
  185:                      List),
  186:             "Expected an absolute in the -file attribute resulting from " ++
  187:             "including file.hrl outside of deterministic mode."),
  188:     ok.
  189: 
  190: %%% Here is a little reimplementation of epp:parse_file, which times out
  191: %%% after 4 seconds if the epp server doesn't respond. If we use the
  192: %%% regular epp:parse_file, the test case will time out, and then epp
  193: %%% server will go on growing until we dump core.
  194: epp_parse_file(File, Inc, Predef) ->
  195:     List = do_epp_parse_file(fun() ->
  196: 				     epp:open(File, Inc, Predef)
  197: 			     end),
  198:     List = do_epp_parse_file(fun() ->
  199: 				     Opts = [{name, File},
  200: 					     {includes, Inc},
  201: 					     {macros, Predef}],
  202: 				     epp:open(Opts)
  203: 			     end),
  204:     {ok, List}.
  205: 
  206: do_epp_parse_file(Open) ->
  207:     {ok, Epp} = Open(),
  208:     List = collect_epp_forms(Epp),
  209:     epp:close(Epp),
  210:     List.
  211: 
  212: collect_epp_forms(Epp) ->
  213:     Result = epp_parse_erl_form(Epp),
  214:     case Result of
  215: 	{error, _Error} ->
  216: 	    [Result | collect_epp_forms(Epp)];
  217: 	{ok, Form} ->
  218: 	    [Form | collect_epp_forms(Epp)];
  219: 	{eof, _} ->
  220: 	    [Result]
  221:     end.
  222: 
  223: epp_parse_erl_form(Epp) ->
  224:     P = spawn(?MODULE, epp_parse_erl_form, [Epp, self()]),
  225:     receive
  226: 	{P, Result} ->
  227: 	    Result
  228:     after 4000 ->
  229: 	    exit(Epp, kill),
  230: 	    exit(P, kill),
  231: 	    timeout
  232:     end.
  233: 
  234: epp_parse_erl_form(Epp, Parent) ->
  235:     Parent ! {self(), epp:parse_erl_form(Epp)}.
  236: 
  237: check_errors([]) ->
  238:     ok;
  239: check_errors([{error, Info} | Rest]) ->
  240:     {Line, Mod, Desc} = Info,
  241:     case Line of
  242: 	I when is_integer(I) -> ok;
  243: 	{L,C} when is_integer(L), is_integer(C), C >= 1 -> ok
  244:     end,
  245:     Str = lists:flatten(Mod:format_error(Desc)),
  246:     [Str] = io_lib:format("~s", [Str]),
  247:     check_errors(Rest);
  248: check_errors([_ | Rest]) ->
  249:     check_errors(Rest).
  250: 
  251: 
  252: upcase_mac_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  253:     File = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "mac2.erl"),
  254:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [], []),
  255:     [_, {attribute, _, plupp, Tuple} | _] = List,
  256:     Tuple = {1, 1, 3, 3},
  257:     ok.
  258: 
  259: upcase_mac_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     File = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "mac2.erl"),
  261:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [], [{p, 5}, {'P', 6}]),
  262:     [_, {attribute, _, plupp, Tuple} | _] = List,
  263:     Tuple = {5, 5, 6, 6},
  264:     ok.
  265: 
  266: predef_mac(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  267:     File = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "mac3.erl"),
  268:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [], []),
  269:     [_,
  270:      {attribute, Anno, l, Line1},
  271:      {attribute, _, f, File},
  272:      {attribute, _, machine1, _},
  273:      {attribute, _, module, mac3},
  274:      {attribute, _, m, mac3},
  275:      {attribute, _, ms, "mac3"},
  276:      {attribute, _, machine2, _}
  277:      | _] = List,
  278:     Line1 = erl_anno:line(Anno),
  279:     ok.
  280: 
  281: variable_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  282:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  283:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "variable_1.erl"),
  284:     true = os:putenv("VAR", DataDir),
  285:     %% variable_1.erl includes variable_1_include.hrl and
  286:     %% variable_1_include_dir.hrl.
  287:     {ok, List} = epp:parse_file(File, [], []),
  288:     {value, {attribute,_,a,{value1,value2}}} =
  289: 	lists:keysearch(a,3,List),
  290:     ok.
  291: 
  292: %% undef without module declaration.
  293: otp_4870(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  294:     Ts = [{otp_4870,
  295:            <<"-undef(foo).
  296:            ">>,
  297:            []}],
  298:     [] = check(Config, Ts),
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: %% crashing erl_scan
  302: otp_4871(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  303:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  304:     File = filename:join(Dir, "otp_4871.erl"),
  305:     ok = file:write_file(File, "-module(otp_4871)."),
  306:     %% Testing crash in erl_scan. Unfortunately there currently is
  307:     %% no known way to crash erl_scan so it is emulated by killing the
  308:     %% file io server. This assumes lots of things about how
  309:     %% the processes are started and how monitors are set up,
  310:     %% so there are some sanity checks before killing.
  311:     {ok,Epp} = epp:open(File, []),
  312:     timer:sleep(1),
  313:     true = current_module(Epp, epp),
  314:     {monitored_by,[Io]} = process_info(Epp, monitored_by),
  315:     true = current_module(Io, file_io_server),
  316:     exit(Io, emulate_crash),
  317:     timer:sleep(1),
  318:     {error,{_Line,epp,cannot_parse}} = otp_4871_parse_file(Epp),
  319:     epp:close(Epp),
  320:     ok.
  321: 
  322: current_module(Pid, Mod) ->
  323:     {current_function, {Mod, _, _}} = process_info(Pid, current_function),
  324:     true.
  325: 
  326: otp_4871_parse_file(Epp) ->
  327:     case epp:parse_erl_form(Epp) of
  328: 	{ok,_} -> otp_4871_parse_file(Epp);
  329: 	Other -> Other
  330:     end.
  331: 
  332: %% OTP-5362. The -file attribute is recognized.
  333: otp_5362(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  334:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  335: 
  336:     Copts = [return, strong_validation,{i,Dir}],
  337: 
  338:     File_Incl = filename:join(Dir, "incl_5362.erl"),
  339:     File_Incl2 = filename:join(Dir, "incl2_5362.erl"),
  340:     File_Incl3 = filename:join(Dir, "incl3_5362.erl"),
  341:     Incl = <<"-module(incl_5362).
  342: 
  343:               -include(\"incl2_5362.erl\").
  344: 
  345:               -include_lib(\"incl3_5362.erl\").
  346: 
  347:               hi(There) -> % line 7
  348:                    a.
  349:            ">>,
  350:     Incl2 = <<"-file(\"some.file\", 100).
  351: 
  352:                foo(Bar) -> % line 102
  353:                    foo.
  354:             ">>,
  355:     Incl3 = <<"glurk(Foo) -> % line 1
  356:                   bar.
  357:             ">>,
  358:     ok = file:write_file(File_Incl, Incl),
  359:     ok = file:write_file(File_Incl2, Incl2),
  360:     ok = file:write_file(File_Incl3, Incl3),
  361: 
  362:     {ok, incl_5362, InclWarnings} = compile:file(File_Incl, Copts),
  363:     true = message_compare(
  364:                    [{File_Incl3,[{{1,1},erl_lint,{unused_function,{glurk,1}}},
  365:                                  {{1,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Foo'}}]},
  366:                     {File_Incl,[{{7,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{hi,1}}},
  367:                                 {{7,18},erl_lint,{unused_var,'There'}}]},
  368:                     {"some.file",[{{102,16},erl_lint,{unused_function,{foo,1}}},
  369:                                   {{102,20},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Bar'}}]}],
  370:                    lists:usort(InclWarnings)),
  371: 
  372:     file:delete(File_Incl),
  373:     file:delete(File_Incl2),
  374:     file:delete(File_Incl3),
  375: 
  376:     %% A -file attribute referring back to the including file.
  377:     File_Back = filename:join(Dir, "back_5362.erl"),
  378:     File_Back_hrl = filename:join(Dir, "back_5362.hrl"),
  379:     Back = <<"-module(back_5362).
  380: 
  381:               -export([foo/1]).
  382: 
  383:               -file(?FILE, 1).
  384:               -include(\"back_5362.hrl\").
  385: 
  386:               foo(V) -> % line 4
  387:                   bar.
  388:               ">>,
  389:     Back_hrl = [<<"
  390:                   -file(\"">>,File_Back,<<"\", 2).
  391:                  ">>],
  392: 
  393:     ok = file:write_file(File_Back, Back),
  394:     ok = file:write_file(File_Back_hrl, list_to_binary(Back_hrl)),
  395: 
  396:     {ok, back_5362, BackWarnings} = compile:file(File_Back, Copts),
  397:     true = message_compare(
  398:                    [{File_Back,[{{4,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'V'}}]}],
  399:                    BackWarnings),
  400:     file:delete(File_Back),
  401:     file:delete(File_Back_hrl),
  402: 
  403:     %% Set filename but keep line.
  404:     File_Change = filename:join(Dir, "change_5362.erl"),
  405:     Change = [<<"-module(change_5362).
  406: 
  407:                 -file(?FILE, 100).
  408: 
  409:                 -export([foo/1,bar/1]).
  410: 
  411:                 -file(\"other.file\", ?LINE). % like an included file...
  412:                 foo(A) -> % line 105
  413:                     bar.
  414: 
  415:                 -file(\"">>,File_Change,<<"\", 1000).
  416: 
  417:                 bar(B) -> % line 1002
  418:                     foo.
  419:               ">>],
  420: 
  421:     ok = file:write_file(File_Change, list_to_binary(Change)),
  422: 
  423:     {ok, change_5362, ChangeWarnings} =
  424:         compile:file(File_Change, Copts),
  425:     true = message_compare(
  426:                    [{File_Change,[{{1002,21},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]},
  427:                     {"other.file",[{{105,21},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}}]}],
  428:                    lists:usort(ChangeWarnings)),
  429: 
  430:     file:delete(File_Change),
  431: 
  432:     %% -file attribute ending with a blank (not a newline).
  433:     File_Blank = filename:join(Dir, "blank_5362.erl"),
  434: 
  435:     Blank = <<"-module(blank_5362).
  436: 
  437:                -export([q/1,a/1,b/1,c/1]).
  438: 
  439:                -
  440:                file(?FILE, 18). q(Q) -> foo. % line 18
  441: 
  442:                a(A) -> % line 20
  443:                    1.
  444: 
  445:                -file(?FILE, 42).
  446: 
  447:                b(B) -> % line 44
  448:                    2.
  449: 
  450:                -file(?FILE, ?LINE). c(C) -> % line 47
  451:                    3.
  452:             ">>,
  453:     ok = file:write_file(File_Blank, Blank),
  454:     {ok, blank_5362, BlankWarnings} = compile:file(File_Blank, Copts),
  455:     true = message_compare(
  456:              [{File_Blank,[{{18,3},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Q'}},
  457:                            {{20,18},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}},
  458:                            {{44,18},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  459:                            {{47,3},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C'}}]}],
  460:               lists:usort(BlankWarnings)),
  461:     file:delete(File_Blank),
  462: 
  463:     %% __FILE__ is set by inclusion and by -file attribute
  464:     FILE_incl = filename:join(Dir, "file_5362.erl"),
  465:     FILE_incl1 = filename:join(Dir, "file_incl_5362.erl"),
  466:     FILE = <<"-module(file_5362).
  467: 
  468:               -export([ff/0, ii/0]).
  469: 
  470:               -include(\"file_incl_5362.erl\").
  471: 
  472:               -file(\"other_file\", 100).
  473: 
  474:               ff() ->
  475:                   ?FILE.">>,
  476:     FILE1 = <<"ii() -> ?FILE.
  477:               ">>,
  478:     FILE_Mod = file_5362,
  479:     ok = file:write_file(FILE_incl, FILE),
  480:     ok = file:write_file(FILE_incl1, FILE1),
  481:     FILE_Copts = [return, {i,Dir},{outdir,Dir}],
  482:     {ok, file_5362, []} = compile:file(FILE_incl, FILE_Copts),
  483:     AbsFile = filename:rootname(FILE_incl, ".erl"),
  484:     {module, FILE_Mod} = code:load_abs(AbsFile, FILE_Mod),
  485:     II = FILE_Mod:ii(),
  486:     "file_incl_5362.erl" = filename:basename(II),
  487:     FF = FILE_Mod:ff(),
  488:     "other_file" = filename:basename(FF),
  489:     code:purge(file_5362),
  490: 
  491:     file:delete(FILE_incl),
  492:     file:delete(FILE_incl1),
  493: 
  494:     ok.
  495: 
  496: pmod(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  497:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  498:     Pmod = filename:join(DataDir, "pmod.erl"),
  499:     case epp:parse_file([Pmod], [], []) of
  500: 	      {ok,Forms} ->
  501: 		  %% io:format("~p\n", [Forms]),
  502: 		  [] = [F || {error,_}=F <- Forms],
  503: 		  ok
  504: 	  end,
  505:     ok.
  506: 
  507: not_circular(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  508:     %% Used to generate a compilation error, wrongly saying that it
  509:     %% was a circular definition.
  510: 
  511:     Ts = [{circular_1,
  512:            <<"-define(S(S), ??S).\n"
  513:              "t() -> \"string\" = ?S(string), ok.\n">>,
  514:            ok}],
  515:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  516:     ok.
  517: 
  518: %% Skip some bytes in the beginning of the file.
  519: skip_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  520:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  521:     File = filename:join([PrivDir, "epp_test_skip_header.erl"]),
  522:     ok = file:write_file(File,
  523: 			       <<"some bytes
  524:                                   in the beginning of the file
  525:                                   that should be skipped
  526:                                   -module(epp_test_skip_header).
  527:                                   -export([main/1]).
  528: 
  529:                                   main(_) -> ?MODULE.
  530: 
  531:                                   ">>),
  532:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read]),
  533:     io:get_line(Fd, ''),
  534:     io:get_line(Fd, ''),
  535:     io:get_line(Fd, ''),
  536:     {ok, Epp} = epp:open([{fd, Fd}, {name, list_to_atom(File)}, {location, 4}]),
  537: 
  538:     Forms = epp:parse_file(Epp),
  539:     [] = [Reason || {error, Reason} <- Forms],
  540:     ok = epp:close(Epp),
  541:     ok = file:close(Fd),
  542: 
  543:     ok.
  544: 
  545: %% ?MODULE before module declaration.
  546: otp_6277(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  547:     Ts = [{otp_6277,
  548:            <<"-undef(ASSERT).
  549:               -define(ASSERT, ?MODULE).
  550: 
  551:               ?ASSERT().">>,
  552:            [{error,{4,epp,{undefined,'MODULE', none}}}]}],
  553:     [] = check(Config, Ts),
  554:     ok.
  555:

  557: %% considered defined.
  558: gh_4995(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  559:     Ts = [{gh_4995,
  560:            <<"-ifdef(MODULE).
  561:               -record(r, {x = ?MODULE}).
  562:               -endif.">>,
  563:            []}],
  564:     [] = check(Config, Ts),
  565:     ok.

  569:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),

  580:                        after 10000 ->
  581:                             exit({timeout,on_line,?LINE,was_expecting,??Msg})

  585:     ok = file:write_file(File, Contents),

  870:             [{error,{2,epp,{depth,"include"}}}]}

  875:     File = filename:join(Dir, "otp_8130.erl"),
  876:     ok = file:write_file(File,
  877:                                "-module(otp_8130).\n"
  878:                                "-define(a, 3.14).\n"
  879:                                "t() -> ?a.\n"),
  880:     {ok,Epp} = epp:open(File, []),
  881:     PreDefMacs = macs(Epp),
  882:     ['BASE_MODULE','BASE_MODULE_STRING','BEAM',
  883:      'FEATURE_AVAILABLE', 'FEATURE_ENABLED','FILE',
  884:      'FUNCTION_ARITY','FUNCTION_NAME',
  885:      'LINE','MACHINE','MODULE','MODULE_STRING',
  886:      'OTP_RELEASE'] = PreDefMacs,
  887:     {ok,[{'-',_},{atom,_,file}|_]} = epp:scan_erl_form(Epp),
  888:     {ok,[{'-',_},{atom,_,module}|_]} = epp:scan_erl_form(Epp),
  889:     {ok,[{atom,_,t}|_]} = epp:scan_erl_form(Epp),
  890:     {eof,_} = epp:scan_erl_form(Epp),
  891:     [a] = macs(Epp) -- PreDefMacs,
  892:     epp:close(Epp),
  893: 
  894:     %% escript
  895:     ModuleStr = "any_name",
  896:     Module = list_to_atom(ModuleStr),
  897:     fun() ->
  898:             PreDefMacros = [{'MODULE', Module, redefine},
  899:                             {'MODULE_STRING', ModuleStr, redefine},
  900:                             a, {b,2}],
  901:             {ok,Epp2} = epp:open(File, [], PreDefMacros),
  902:             [{atom,_,true}] = macro(Epp2, a),
  903:             [{integer,_,2}] = macro(Epp2, b),
  904:             false = macro(Epp2, c),
  905:             epp:close(Epp2)
  906:     end(),
  907:     fun() ->
  908:             PreDefMacros = [{a,b,c}],
  909:             {error,{bad,{a,b,c}}} = epp:open(File, [], PreDefMacros)
  910:     end(),
  911:     fun() ->
  912:             PreDefMacros = [a, {a,1}],
  913:             {error,{redefine,a}} = epp:open(File, [], PreDefMacros)
  914:     end(),
  915:     fun() ->
  916:             PreDefMacros = [{a,1},a],
  917:             {error,{redefine,a}} = epp:open(File, [], PreDefMacros)
  918:     end(),
  919: 
  920:     {error,enoent} = epp:open("no such file", []),
  921:     {error,enoent} = epp:parse_file("no such file", [], []),
  922: 
  923:     _ = ifdef(Config),
  924: 
  925:     ok.
  926: 
  927: scan_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  928:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  929:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "source_name.erl"),
  930: 
  931:     {ok, Toks, [{encoding, _}]} = epp:scan_file(File, []),
  932:     [FileForm1, ModuleForm, ExportForm,
  933:      FileForm2, FileForm3, FunctionForm,
  934:      {eof,_}] = Toks,
  935:     [{'-',_}, {atom,_,file}, {'(',_} | _ ] = FileForm1,
  936:     [{'-',_}, {atom,_,module}, {'(',_} | _ ] = ModuleForm,
  937:     [{'-',_}, {atom,_,export}, {'(',_} | _ ] = ExportForm,
  938:     [{'-',_}, {atom,_,file}, {'(',_} | _ ] = FileForm2,
  939:     [{'-',_}, {atom,_,file}, {'(',_} | _ ] = FileForm3,
  940:     ok.
  941: 
  942: macs(Epp) ->
  943:     Macros = epp:macro_defs(Epp), % not documented
  944:     lists:sort([MName || {{atom,MName},_} <- Macros]).
  945: 
  946: macro(Epp, N) ->
  947:     case lists:keyfind({atom,N}, 1, epp:macro_defs(Epp)) of
  948:         false -> false;
  949:         {{atom,N},{_,V}} -> V;
  950:         {{atom,N},Defs} -> lists:append([V || {_,{_,V}} <- Defs])
  951:     end.
  952: 
  953: ifdef(Config) ->
  954:     Cs = [{ifdef_c1,
  955:            <<"-ifdef(a).\n"
  956:              "a bug.\n"
  957:              "-else.\n"
  958:              "-ifdef(A).\n"
  959:              "a bug.\n"
  960:              "-endif.\n"
  961:              "-else.\n"
  962:              "t() -> ok.\n"
  963:              "-endif.">>,
  964:            {errors,[{{7,2},epp,{illegal,"repeated",'else'}}],[]}},
  965: 
  966:           {ifdef_c2,
  967:            <<"-define(a, true).\n"
  968:              "-ifdef(a).\n"
  969:              "a bug.\n"
  970:              "-endif.">>,
  971:            {errors,[{{3,3},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","bug"]}],[]}},
  972: 
  973:           {ifdef_c3,
  974:            <<"-define(a, true).\n"
  975:              "-ifdef(a).\n"
  976:              "-endif">>,
  977: 
  978:            {errors,[{{3,2},epp,{bad,endif}},
  979:                     {{3,7},epp,{illegal,"unterminated",ifdef}}],
  980:           []}},
  981: 
  982:           {ifdef_c4,
  983:            <<"\n-ifdef a.\n"
  984:              "-endif.\n">>,
  985:            {errors,[{{2,8},epp,{bad,ifdef}}],[]}},
  986: 
  987:           {ifdef_c5,
  988:            <<"-ifdef(a).\n"
  989:              "-else.\n"
  990:              "-endif.\n"
  991:              "-endif.\n">>,
  992:            {errors,[{{4,2},epp,{illegal,"unbalanced",endif}}],[]}},
  993: 
  994:           {ifdef_c6,
  995:            <<"-ifdef(a).\n"
  996:              "-else.\n"
  997:              "-endif.\n"
  998:              "-else.\n">>,
  999:            {errors,[{{4,2},epp,{illegal,"unbalanced",'else'}}],[]}},
 1000: 
 1001:           {ifdef_c7,
 1002:            <<"-ifndef(a).\n"
 1003:              "-else\n"
 1004:              "foo bar\n"
 1005:              "-else.\n"
 1006:              "t() -> a.\n"
 1007:              "-endif.\n">>,
 1008:            {errors,[{{3,1},epp,{bad,'else'}}],[]}},
 1009: 
 1010:           {ifdef_c8,
 1011:            <<"-ifdef(a).\n"
 1012:               "-foo bar.">>,
 1013:            {errors,[{{2,10},epp,{illegal,"unterminated",ifdef}}],[]}},
 1014: 
 1015:           {ifdef_c9,
 1016:            <<"-ifdef(a).\n"
 1017:               "3.3e12000.\n"
 1018:               "-endif.\n">>,
 1019:            []},
 1020: 
 1021:           {ifdef_c10,
 1022:            <<"\nt() -> 3.3e12000.\n">>,
 1023:            {errors,[{{2,8},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},
 1024:                     {{2,17},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","'.'"]}], % ...
 1025:             []}},
 1026: 
 1027:           {ifndef_c1,
 1028:            <<"-ifndef(a).\n"
 1029:              "-ifndef(A).\n"
 1030:              "t() -> ok.\n"
 1031:              "-endif.\n"
 1032:              "-else.\n"
 1033:              "a bug.\n"
 1034:              "-else.\n"
 1035:              "a bug.\n"
 1036:              "-endif.">>,
 1037:            {errors,[{{7,2},epp,{illegal,"repeated",'else'}}],[]}},
 1038: 
 1039:           {ifndef_c3,
 1040:            <<"-ifndef(a).\n"
 1041:              "-endif">>,
 1042: 
 1043:            {errors,[{{2,2},epp,{bad,endif}},
 1044:                     {{2,7},epp,{illegal,"unterminated",ifndef}}],
 1045:           []}},
 1046: 
 1047:           {ifndef_c4,
 1048:            <<"\n-ifndef a.\n"
 1049:              "-endif.\n">>,
 1050:            {errors,[{{2,9},epp,{bad,ifndef}}],[]}},
 1051: 
 1052:           {define_c5,
 1053:            <<"-\ndefine a.\n">>,
 1054:            {errors,[{{2,8},epp,{bad,define}}],[]}}
 1055:           ],
 1056:     [] = compile(Config, Cs),
 1057: 
 1058:     Ts =  [{ifdef_1,
 1059:             <<"-ifdef(a).\n"
 1060:               "a bug.\n"
 1061:               "-else.\n"
 1062:               "-ifdef(A).\n"
 1063:               "a bug.\n"
 1064:               "-endif.\n"
 1065:               "t() -> ok.\n"
 1066:               "-endif.">>,
 1067:            ok},
 1068: 
 1069:            {ifdef_2,
 1070:             <<"-define(a, true).\n"
 1071:               "-ifdef(a).\n"
 1072:               "-define(A, true).\n"
 1073:               "-ifdef(A).\n"
 1074:               "t() -> ok.\n"
 1075:               "-else.\n"
 1076:               "a bug.\n"
 1077:               "-endif.\n"
 1078:               "-else.\n"
 1079:               "a bug.\n"
 1080:               "-endif.">>,
 1081:            ok},
 1082: 
 1083:            {ifdef_3,
 1084:             <<"\n-define(a, true).\n"
 1085:               "-ifndef(a).\n"
 1086:               "a bug.\n"
 1087:               "-else.\n"
 1088:               "-define(A, true).\n"
 1089:               "-ifndef(A).\n"
 1090:               "a bug.\n"
 1091:               "-else.\n"
 1092:               "t() -> ok.\n"
 1093:               "-endif.\n"
 1094:               "-endif.">>,
 1095:            ok},
 1096:

 1099:               "a bug.\n"
 1100:               "-ifdef(a).\n"
 1101:                "a bug.\n"
 1102:               "-else.\n"
 1103:               "-endif.\n"

 1141:     Cs = [{error_c1,

 1143: 	     "-ifdef(NOT_DEFINED).\n"
 1144: 	     " -error(\"this one will be skipped\").\n"
 1145: 	     "-endif.\n">>,

 1150: 	     " t() -> a.\n"
 1151: 	     "-else.\n"
 1152: 	     "-ifdef(CONFIG_B).\n"
 1153: 	     " t() -> b.\n"
 1154: 	     "-else.\n"
 1155: 	     "-error(\"Neither CONFIG_A nor CONFIG_B are available\").\n"
 1156: 	     "-endif.\n"
 1157: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1158: 	   {errors,[{{7,2},epp,{error,"Neither CONFIG_A nor CONFIG_B are available"}}],[]}},

 1160: 	  {error_c3,

 1162: 	   {errors,[{{1,21},epp,{bad,error}}],[]}}

 1199: %% OTP-12847: Test the -if and -elif directives and the built-in
 1200: %% function defined(Symbol).
 1201: test_if(Config) ->
 1202:     Cs = [{if_1c,
 1203: 	   <<"-if.\n"
 1204: 	     "-endif.\n"
 1205: 	     "-if no_parentheses.\n"
 1206: 	     "-endif.\n"
 1207: 	     "-if(syntax error.\n"
 1208: 	     "-endif.\n"
 1209: 	     "-if(true).\n"
 1210: 	     "-if(a+3).\n"
 1211: 	     "syntax error not triggered here.\n"
 1212: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1213:            {errors,[{{1,23},epp,{bad,'if'}},
 1214: 		    {{3,5},epp,{bad,'if'}},
 1215: 		    {{5,12},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","error"]},
 1216: 		    {{11,1},epp,{illegal,"unterminated",'if'}}],
 1217: 	    []}},
 1218: 
 1219: 	  {if_2c,			       	%Bad guard expressions.
 1220: 	   <<"-if(is_list(integer_to_list(42))).\n" %Not guard BIF.
 1221: 	     "-endif.\n"
 1222: 	     "-if(begin true end).\n"
 1223: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1224: 	   {errors,[{{1,21},epp,{bad,'if'}},
 1225: 		    {{3,2},epp,{bad,'if'}}],
 1226: 	    []}},
 1227: 
 1228: 	  {if_3c,			       	%Invalid use of defined/1.
 1229: 	   <<"-if defined(42).\n"
 1230: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1231: 	   {errors,[{{1,24},epp,{bad,'if'}}],[]}},
 1232:

 1234: 	   <<"-elif OTP_RELEASE > 18.\n">>,
 1235: 	   {errors,[{{1,21},epp,{illegal,"unbalanced",'elif'}}],[]}},

 1238: 	   <<"-ifdef(not_defined_today).\n"
 1239: 	     "-else.\n"
 1240: 	     "-elif OTP_RELEASE > 18.\n"
 1241: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1242: 	   {errors,[{{3,2},epp,{illegal,"unbalanced",'elif'}}],[]}},
 1243:

 1245: 	   <<"-if(defined(OTP_RELEASE)).\n"
 1246: 	     "-else.\n"
 1247: 	     "-elif(true).\n"
 1248: 	     "-endif.\n">>,

 1252: 	   <<"-if(begin true end).\n"		%Not a guard expression.
 1253: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1254: 	   {errors,[{{1,21},epp,{bad,'if'}}],[]}},
 1255:

 1257: 	   <<"-if(?foo).\n"                     %Undefined symbol.
 1258: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1259: 	   {errors,[{{1,25},epp,{undefined,foo,none}}],[]}}
 1260: 
 1261: 	 ],
 1262:     [] = compile(Config, Cs),
 1263: 
 1264:     Ts = [{if_1,
 1265: 	   <<"-if(?OTP_RELEASE > 18).\n"
 1266: 	     "t() -> ok.\n"
 1267: 	     "-else.\n"
 1268: 	     "a bug.\n"
 1269: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1270:            ok},

 1276: 	     "t() -> ok.\n"
 1277: 	     "-else.\n"
 1278: 	     "a bug.\n"
 1279: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1280:            ok},
 1281:

 1284: 	     "t() -> ok.\n"
 1285: 	     "-elif(?OTP_RELEASE > 18).\n"
 1286: 	     "a bug.\n"
 1287: 	     "-else.\n"
 1288: 	     "a bug.\n"
 1289: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1290:            ok},

 1295: 	     "t() -> ok.\n"
 1296: 	     "-else.\n"
 1297: 	     "a bug.\n"
 1298: 	     "-endif.\n">>,
 1299:            ok},

 1345: %% Advanced test on overloading macros.
 1346: overload_mac(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1347:     Cs = [
 1348:           %% '-undef' removes all definitions of a macro
 1349:           {overload_mac_c1,
 1350:            <<"-define(A, a).\n"
 1351:             "-define(A(X), X).\n"
 1352:             "-undef(A).\n"
 1353:             "t1() -> ?A.\n",
 1354:             "t2() -> ?A(1).">>,
 1355:            {errors,[{{4,10},epp,{undefined,'A', none}},
 1356:                     {{5,10},epp,{undefined,'A', 1}}],[]}},
 1357: 
 1358:           %% cannot overload predefined macros
 1359:           {overload_mac_c2,
 1360:            <<"\n-define(MODULE(X), X).">>,
 1361:            {errors,[{{2,9},epp,{redefine_predef,'MODULE'}}],[]}},
 1362: 
 1363:           %% cannot overload macros with same arity
 1364:           {overload_mac_c3,
 1365:            <<"-define(A(X), X).\n"
 1366:             "-define(A(Y), Y).">>,
 1367:            {errors,[{{2,9},epp,{redefine,'A'}}],[]}},
 1368: 
 1369:           {overload_mac_c4,
 1370:            <<"-define(A, a).\n"
 1371:             "-define(A(X,Y), {X,Y}).\n"
 1372:             "a(X) -> X.\n"
 1373:             "t() -> ?A(1).">>,
 1374:            {errors,[{{4,9},epp,{mismatch,'A'}}],[]}}
 1375:          ],
 1376:     [] = compile(Config, Cs),
 1377: 
 1378:     Ts = [
 1379:           {overload_mac_r1,
 1380:            <<"-define(A, 1).\n"
 1381:             "-define(A(X), X).\n"
 1382:             "-define(A(X, Y), {X, Y}).\n"
 1383:             "t() -> {?A, ?A(2), ?A(3, 4)}.">>,
 1384:            {1, 2, {3, 4}}},
 1385: 
 1386:           {overload_mac_r2,
 1387:            <<"-define(A, 1).\n"
 1388:             "-define(A(X), X).\n"
 1389:             "t() -> ?A(?A).">>,
 1390:            1},
 1391: 
 1392:           {overload_mac_r3,
 1393:            <<"-define(A, ?B).\n"
 1394:             "-define(B, a).\n"
 1395:             "-define(B(X), {b,X}).\n"
 1396:             "a(X) -> X.\n"
 1397:             "t() -> ?A(1).">>,
 1398:            1}
 1399:           ],
 1400:     [] = run(Config, Ts).
 1401:

 1403: %% OTP-8388. More tests on overloaded macros.
 1404: otp_8388(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1405:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1406:     File = filename:join(Dir, "otp_8388.erl"),
 1407:     ok = file:write_file(File, <<"-module(otp_8388)."
 1408:                                        "-define(LINE, a).">>),
 1409:     fun() ->
 1410:             PreDefMacros = [{'LINE', a}],
 1411:             {error,{redefine_predef,'LINE'}} =
 1412:                 epp:open(File, [], PreDefMacros)
 1413:     end(),
 1414: 
 1415:     fun() ->
 1416:             PreDefMacros = ['LINE'],
 1417:             {error,{redefine_predef,'LINE'}} =
 1418:                 epp:open(File, [], PreDefMacros)
 1419:     end(),
 1420: 
 1421:     Ts = [
 1422:           {macro_1,
 1423:            <<"-define(m(A), A).\n"
 1424:              "t() -> ?m(,).\n">>,
 1425:            {errors,[{{2,9},epp,{arg_error,m}}],[]}},
 1426:           {macro_2,
 1427:            <<"-define(m(A), A).\n"
 1428:              "t() -> ?m(a,).\n">>,
 1429:            {errors,[{{2,9},epp,{arg_error,m}}],[]}},
 1430:           {macro_3,
 1431:            <<"\n-define(LINE, a).\n">>,
 1432:            {errors,[{{2,9},epp,{redefine_predef,'LINE'}}],[]}},
 1433:           {macro_4,
 1434:            <<"-define(A(B, C, D), {B,C,D}).\n"
 1435:              "t() -> ?A(a,,3).\n">>,
 1436:            {errors,[{{2,9},epp,{mismatch,'A'}}],[]}},
 1437:           {macro_5,
 1438:            <<"-define(Q, {?F0(), ?F1(,,4)}).\n">>,
 1439:            {errors,[{{1,40},epp,{arg_error,'F1'}}],[]}},
 1440:           {macro_6,
 1441:            <<"-define(FOO(X), ?BAR(X)).\n"
 1442:              "-define(BAR(X), ?FOO(X)).\n"
 1443:              "-undef(FOO).\n"
 1444:              "test() -> ?BAR(1).\n">>,
 1445:            {errors,[{{4,12},epp,{undefined,'FOO',1}}],[]}}
 1446:          ],
 1447:     [] = compile(Config, Ts),
 1448:     ok.

 1473: %% OTP-8911. -file and file inclusion bug.
 1474: otp_8911(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1475:     case test_server:is_cover() of
 1476: 	true ->
 1477: 	    {skip, "Testing cover, so cannot run when cover is already running"};
 1478: 	false ->
 1479: 	    do_otp_8911(Config)
 1480:     end.
 1481: do_otp_8911(Config) ->
 1482:     {ok, CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
 1483:     ok = file:set_cwd(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)),
 1484: 
 1485:     File = "i.erl",
 1486:     Cont = <<"-module(i).
 1487:               -export([t/0]).
 1488:               -file(\"fil1\", 100).
 1489:               -include(\"i1.erl\").
 1490:               t() ->
 1491:                   a.
 1492:            ">>,
 1493:     ok = file:write_file(File, Cont),
 1494:     Incl = <<"-file(\"fil2\", 35).
 1495:               t1() ->
 1496:                   b.
 1497:            ">>,
 1498:     File1 = "i1.erl",
 1499:     ok = file:write_file(File1, Incl),
 1500: 
 1501:     {ok, i} = cover:compile(File),
 1502:     a = i:t(),
 1503:     {ok,[{{i,6},1}]} = cover:analyse(i, calls, line),
 1504:     cover:stop(),
 1505: 
 1506:     file:delete(File),
 1507:     file:delete(File1),
 1508:     file:set_cwd(CWD),
 1509:     ok.
 1510:

 1518:     ok.
 1519: 
 1520: %% OTP-10302. Unicode characters scanner/parser.
 1521: otp_10302(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1522:     %% Two messages (one too many). Keeps otp_4871 happy.
 1523:     Cs = [{otp_10302,
 1524:            <<"%% coding: utf-8\n \n \x{E4}">>,
 1525:            {errors,[{{3,1},epp,cannot_parse},
 1526:                     {{3,1},file_io_server,invalid_unicode}],[]}}
 1527:          ],
 1528:     [] = compile(Config, Cs),
 1529:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1530:     File = filename:join(Dir, "otp_10302.erl"),
 1531:     utf8 = encoding("coding: utf-8", File),
 1532:     utf8 = encoding("coding: UTF-8", File),
 1533:     latin1 = encoding("coding: Latin-1", File),
 1534:     latin1 = encoding("coding: latin-1", File),
 1535:     none = encoding_com("coding: utf-8", File),
 1536:     none = encoding_com("\n\n%% coding: utf-8", File),
 1537:     none = encoding_nocom("\n\n coding: utf-8", File),
 1538:     utf8 = encoding_com("\n%% coding: utf-8", File),
 1539:     utf8 = encoding_nocom("\n coding: utf-8", File),
 1540:     none = encoding("coding: \nutf-8", File),
 1541:     latin1 = encoding("Encoding :  latin-1", File),
 1542:     utf8 = encoding("ccoding: UTF-8", File),
 1543:     utf8 = encoding("coding= utf-8", File),
 1544:     utf8 = encoding_com(" %% coding= utf-8", File),
 1545:     utf8 = encoding("coding  =  utf-8", File),
 1546:     none = encoding("coding: utf-16 coding: utf-8", File), %first is bad
 1547:     none = encoding("Coding: utf-8", File),    %capital c
 1548:     utf8 = encoding("-*- coding: utf-8 -*-", File),
 1549:     utf8 = encoding("-*-coding= utf-8-*-", File),
 1550:     utf8 = encoding("codingcoding= utf-8", File),
 1551:     ok = prefix("coding: utf-8", File, utf8),
 1552: 
 1553:     "coding: latin-1" = epp:encoding_to_string(latin1),
 1554:     "coding: utf-8" = epp:encoding_to_string(utf8),
 1555:     true = lists:member(epp:default_encoding(), [latin1, utf8]),
 1556: 
 1557:     ok.
 1558: 
 1559: prefix(S, File, Enc) ->
 1560:     prefix(0, S, File, Enc).
 1561: 
 1562: prefix(100, _S, _File, _) ->
 1563:     ok;
 1564: prefix(N, S, File, Enc) ->
 1565:     Enc = encoding(lists:duplicate(N, $\s) ++ S, File),
 1566:     prefix(N+1, S, File, Enc).
 1567: 
 1568: encoding(Enc, File) ->
 1569:     E = encoding_com("%% " ++ Enc, File),
 1570:     none = encoding_com(Enc, File),
 1571:     E = encoding_nocom(Enc, File).
 1572: 
 1573: encoding_com(Enc, File) ->
 1574:     B = list_to_binary(Enc),
 1575:     E = epp:read_encoding_from_binary(B),
 1576:     ok = file:write_file(File, Enc),
 1577:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read]),
 1578:     E = epp:set_encoding(Fd),
 1579:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 1580:     E = epp:read_encoding(File).
 1581: 
 1582: encoding_nocom(Enc, File) ->
 1583:     Options = [{in_comment_only, false}],
 1584:     B = list_to_binary(Enc),
 1585:     E = epp:read_encoding_from_binary(B, Options),
 1586:     ok = file:write_file(File, Enc),
 1587:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read]),
 1588:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 1589:     E = epp:read_encoding(File, Options).
 1590: 
 1591: %% OTP-10820. Unicode filenames.
 1592: otp_10820(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1593:     L = [915,953,959,973,957,953,954,959,957,964],
 1594:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1595:     File = filename:join(Dir, L++".erl"),
 1596:     C1 = <<"%% coding: utf-8\n -module(any).">>,
 1597:     ok = do_otp_10820(File, C1, ["+pc", "latin1"]),
 1598:     ok = do_otp_10820(File, C1, ["+pc", "unicode"]),
 1599:     C2 = <<"\n-module(any).">>,
 1600:     ok = do_otp_10820(File, C2, ["+pc", "latin1"]),
 1601:     ok = do_otp_10820(File, C2, ["+pc", "unicode"]).
 1602: 
 1603: do_otp_10820(File, C, PC) ->
 1604:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+fnu"] ++ PC),
 1605:     ok = rpc:call(Node, file, write_file, [File, C]),
 1606:     {ok, Forms} = rpc:call(Node, epp, parse_file, [File, [],[]]),
 1607:     [{attribute,1,file,{File,1}},
 1608:      {attribute,2,module,any},
 1609:      {eof,2}] = unopaque_forms(Forms),
 1610:     peer:stop(Peer),
 1611:     ok.
 1612: 
 1613: %% OTP_14285: Unicode atoms.
 1614: otp_14285(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1615:     %% This is just a sample of errors.
 1616:     Cs = [{otp_14285,
 1617:            <<"-export([f/0]).
 1618:               -define('a\x{400}b', 'a\x{400}d').
 1619:               f() ->
 1620:                   ?'a\x{400}b'.
 1621:               g() ->
 1622:                   ?\"a\x{400}b\".
 1623:               h() ->
 1624:                   ?'a\x{400}no'().
 1625:               "/utf8>>,
 1626:            {errors,[{{6,20},epp,{call,[63,[91,["97",44,"1024",44,"98"],93]]}},
 1627:                     {{8,20},epp,{undefined,'a\x{400}no',0}}],
 1628:             []}}
 1629:          ],
 1630:     [] = compile(Config, Cs),
 1631:     ok.
 1632: 
 1633: %% OTP-11728. Bugfix circular macro.
 1634: otp_11728(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1635:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1636:     H = <<"-define(MACRO,[[]++?MACRO]).">>,
 1637:     HrlFile = filename:join(Dir, "otp_11728.hrl"),
 1638:     ok = file:write_file(HrlFile, H),
 1639:     C = <<"-module(otp_11728).
 1640:            -export([function_name/0]).
 1641: 
 1642:            -include(\"otp_11728.hrl\").
 1643: 
 1644:            function_name()->
 1645:                A=?MACRO, % line 7
 1646:                ok">>,
 1647:     ErlFile = filename:join(Dir, "otp_11728.erl"),
 1648:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, C),
 1649:     {ok, L} = epp:parse_file(ErlFile, [Dir], []),
 1650:     true = lists:member({error,{7,epp,{circular,'MACRO',none}}}, L),
 1651:     _ = file:delete(HrlFile),
 1652:     _ = file:delete(ErlFile),
 1653:     ok.
 1654: 
 1655: %% Check the new API for setting the default encoding.
 1656: encoding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1657:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1658:     ErlFile = filename:join(Dir, "encoding.erl"),
 1659: 
 1660:     %% Try a latin-1 file with no encoding given.
 1661:     C1 = <<"-module(encoding).
 1662:            %% ",246,"
 1663: 	  ">>,
 1664:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, C1),
 1665:     {ok,[{attribute,{1,1},file,_},
 1666: 	 {attribute,{1,2},module,encoding},
 1667: 	 {error,_},
 1668: 	 {error,{{2,12},epp,cannot_parse}},
 1669: 	 {eof,{2,12}}]} = epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [{location, {1,1}}]),
 1670:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1671: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1672: 	 {eof,3}]} =
 1673: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [{default_encoding,latin1}]),
 1674:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1675: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1676: 	 {eof,3}],Extra0} =
 1677: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [{default_encoding,latin1},extra]),
 1678:     none = proplists:get_value(encoding, Extra0),
 1679: 
 1680:     %% Try a latin-1 file with encoding given in a comment.
 1681:     C2 = <<"-module(encoding).
 1682:            %% encoding: latin-1
 1683:            %% ",246,"
 1684: 	  ">>,
 1685:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, C2),
 1686:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1687: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1688: 	 {eof,4}]} =
 1689: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, []),
 1690:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1691: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1692: 	 {eof,4}]} =
 1693: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [{default_encoding,latin1}]),
 1694:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1695: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1696: 	 {eof,4}]} =
 1697: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [{default_encoding,utf8}]),
 1698:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1699: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1700: 	 {eof,4}],Extra1} =
 1701: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [extra]),
 1702:     latin1 = proplists:get_value(encoding, Extra1),
 1703: 
 1704:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1705: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1706: 	 {eof,4}],Extra2} =
 1707: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [{default_encoding,latin1},extra]),
 1708:     latin1 = proplists:get_value(encoding, Extra2),
 1709:     {ok,[{attribute,1,file,_},
 1710: 	 {attribute,1,module,encoding},
 1711: 	 {eof,4}],Extra3} =
 1712: 	epp_parse_file(ErlFile, [{default_encoding,utf8},extra]),
 1713:     latin1 = proplists:get_value(encoding, Extra3),
 1714:     ok.
 1715: 
 1716: extends(Config) ->

 1721:

 1723: 	   <<"-extends(some_other_module).\n"

 1725: 	   {some_other_module,"some_other_module"}}],
 1726:

 1728:     ok.

 1730: function_macro(Config) ->
 1731:     Cs = [{f_c1,
 1732: 	   <<"-define(FUNCTION_NAME, a).\n"
 1733: 	     "-define(FUNCTION_ARITY, a).\n"
 1734: 	     "-define(FS,\n"
 1735: 	     " atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME) ++ \"/\" ++\n"
 1736: 	     " integer_to_list(?FUNCTION_ARITY)).\n"
 1737: 	     "-attr({f,?FUNCTION_NAME}).\n"
 1738: 	     "-attr2(?FS).\n"
 1739: 	     "-file(?FUNCTION_ARITY, 1).\n"
 1740: 	     "f1() ?FUNCTION_NAME/?FUNCTION_ARITY.\n"
 1741: 	     "f2(?FUNCTION_NAME.\n">>,
 1742: 	   {errors,[{{1,28},epp,{redefine_predef,'FUNCTION_NAME'}},
 1743: 		    {{2,9},epp,{redefine_predef,'FUNCTION_ARITY'}},
 1744: 		    {{6,11},epp,{illegal_function,'FUNCTION_NAME'}},
 1745: 		    {{7,9},epp,{illegal_function,'FUNCTION_NAME'}},
 1746: 		    {{8,8},epp,{illegal_function,'FUNCTION_ARITY'}},
 1747: 		    {{9,7},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","f1"]},
 1748: 		    {{10,18},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","'.'"]}],
 1749: 	    []}},
 1750: 
 1751: 	  {f_c2,
 1752: 	   <<"a({a) -> ?FUNCTION_NAME.\n"
 1753: 	     "b(}{) -> ?FUNCTION_ARITY.\n"
 1754: 	     "c(?FUNCTION_NAME, ?not_defined) -> ok.\n">>,
 1755: 	   {errors,[{{1,24},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","')'"]},
 1756: 		    {{2,3},erl_parse,["syntax error before: ","'}'"]},
 1757: 		    {{3,20},epp,{undefined,not_defined,none}}],
 1758: 	    []}},
 1759: 
 1760: 	  {f_c3,
 1761: 	   <<"?FUNCTION_NAME() -> ok.\n"
 1762: 	     "?FUNCTION_ARITY() -> ok.\n">>,
 1763: 	   {errors,[{{1,21},epp,{illegal_function_usage,'FUNCTION_NAME'}},
 1764: 		    {{2,2},epp,{illegal_function_usage,'FUNCTION_ARITY'}}],
 1765: 	    []}}
 1766: 	 ],
 1767: 
 1768:     [] = compile(Config, Cs),
 1769: 
 1770:     Ts = [{f_1,
 1771: 	   <<"t() -> {a,0} = a(), {b,1} = b(1), {c,2} = c(1, 2),\n"
 1772: 	     "  {d,1} = d({d,1}), {foo,1} = foo(foo), ok.\n"
 1773: 	     "a() -> {?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY}.\n"
 1774: 	     "b(_) -> {?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY}.\n"
 1775: 	     "c(_, (_)) -> {?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY}.\n"
 1776: 	     "d({?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY}=F) -> F.\n"
 1777: 	     "-define(FOO, foo).\n"
 1778: 	     "?FOO(?FOO) -> {?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY}.\n">>,
 1779: 	   ok},
 1780: 
 1781: 	  {f_2,
 1782: 	   <<"t() ->\n"
 1783:              "  A = {a,[<<0:24>>,#{a=>1,b=>2}]},\n"
 1784: 	     "  1 = a(A),\n"
 1785: 	     "  ok.\n"
 1786: 	     "a({a,[<<_,_,_>>,#{a:=1,b:=2}]}) -> ?FUNCTION_ARITY.\n">>,
 1787: 	   ok},
 1788: 
 1789: 	  {f_3,
 1790: 	   <<"-define(FS,\n"
 1791: 	     " atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME) ++ \"/\" ++\n"
 1792: 	     " integer_to_list(?FUNCTION_ARITY)).\n"
 1793: 	     "t() ->\n"
 1794: 	     "  {t,0} = {?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY},\n"
 1795: 	     "  \"t/0\" = ?FS,\n"
 1796: 	     "  ok.\n">>,
 1797: 	   ok},
 1798: 
 1799: 	  {f_4,
 1800: 	   <<"-define(__, _, _).\n"
 1801: 	     "-define(FF, ?FUNCTION_NAME, ?FUNCTION_ARITY).\n"
 1802: 	     "a(?__) -> 2 = ?FUNCTION_ARITY.\n"
 1803: 	     "b(?FUNCTION_ARITY, ?__) -> ok.\n"
 1804: 	     "c(?FF) -> ok.\n"
 1805: 	     "t() -> a(1, 2), b(3, 1, 2), c(c, 2), ok.\n">>,
 1806: 	   ok}
 1807: 	 ],
 1808:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 1809: 
 1810:     ok.
 1811: 
 1812: source_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1813:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1814:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "source_name.erl"),
 1815: 
 1816:     source_name_1(File, "/test/gurka.erl"),
 1817:     source_name_1(File, "gaffel.erl"),
 1818: 
 1819:     ok.
 1820: 
 1821: source_name_1(File, Expected) ->
 1822:     Res = epp:parse_file(File, [{source_name, Expected}]),
 1823:     {ok, [{attribute,_,file,{Expected,_}} | _Forms]} = Res.
 1824:

 1826:     %% A test of erl_parse:tokens().

 1829:           #{k => 1,[[a],[{}]] => "str"},
 1830:           #{#{} => [{#{x=>#{3=>$3}}},{3.14,#{}}]}],
 1831:     Ts = [{erl_parse_tokens,
 1832:            P,
 1833:            [{d,{a,V}}],
 1834:            V} || V <- Vs],
 1835:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 1836: 
 1837:     ok.

 2060: triple_quotes_warning(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2061:     Cs1 =
 2062:         [{triple_quotes_warning_1,
 2063:           <<"\n-doc \"foo\".\n">>,
 2064:           []},
 2065:          {triple_quotes_warning_2,
 2066:           <<"\n-doc \"\" \"foo\" \"\".\n">>,
 2067:           []},
 2068:          {triple_quotes_warning_3,
 2069:           <<"\n"
 2070:             "-doc \"\"\"\n"
 2071:             "    foo\n"
 2072:             "    \"\"\".\n">>,
 2073:           {warnings,[{{2,6},epp,tqstring}]}},
 2074:          {triple_quotes_warning_4,
 2075:           <<"\n"
 2076:             "-doc  \"\"\"\"\n"
 2077:             "      \"\"\"\".\n">>,
 2078:           {warnings,
 2079:            [{{2,7},epp,tqstring},
 2080:             {{3,7},epp,tqstring}]}},
 2081:          {triple_quotes_warning_5,
 2082:           <<"\n"
 2083:             "-doc   \"\"\"\"\"\n"
 2084:             "       foo\n"
 2085:             "       \"\"\"\"\".\n">>,
 2086:           {warnings,
 2087:            [{{2,8},epp,tqstring},
 2088:             {{4,9},epp,tqstring}]}}
 2089:         ],
 2090:     [] = compile(Config, Cs1),
 2091: 
 2092:     Cs2 =
 2093:         [{triple_quotes_warning_10,
 2094:           <<"\n"
 2095:             "-export([foo/0]).\n"
 2096:             "foo() ->\n"
 2097:             "    \"\"\"\n"
 2098:             "    bar\n"
 2099:             "    \"\"\".\n">>,
 2100:           {warnings,[{{4,5},epp,tqstring}]}},
 2101:          {triple_quotes_warning_11,
 2102:           <<"\n"
 2103:             "-export([foo/0]).\n"
 2104:             "foo() ->\n"
 2105:             "    \"\"\"\"\n"
 2106:             "    ++ lists:duplicate(4, $x) ++\n"
 2107:             "    \"\"\"\".\n">>,
 2108:           {warnings,
 2109:            [{{4,5},epp,tqstring},
 2110:             {{6,5},epp,tqstring}]}},
 2111:          {triple_quotes_warning_12,
 2112:           <<"\n"
 2113:             "-export([foo/0]).\n"
 2114:             "foo() ->\n"
 2115:             "    \"\"\"\"\"\n"
 2116:             "    bar\n"
 2117:             "    \"\"\"\"\".\n">>,
 2118:           {warnings,
 2119:            [{{4,5},epp,tqstring},
 2120:             {{6,6},epp,tqstring}]}} ],
 2121:     [] = compile(Config, Cs2),
 2122: 
 2123:     ok.
 2124: 
 2125: 
 2126: 
 2127: %% Start location is 1.
 2128: check(Config, Tests) ->
 2129:     eval_tests(Config, fun check_test/3, Tests).
 2130: 
 2131: %% Start location is {1,1}.
 2132: compile(Config, Tests) ->
 2133:     eval_tests(Config, fun compile_test/3, Tests).
 2134: 
 2135: run(Config, Tests) ->
 2136:     eval_tests(Config, fun run_test/3, Tests).
 2137: 
 2138: eval_tests(Config, Fun, Tests) ->
 2139:     TestsWithOpts =
 2140:         [case Test of
 2141:              {N,P,E} ->
 2142:                  {N,P,[],E};
 2143:              {_,_,_,_} ->
 2144:                  Test
 2145:          end || Test <- Tests],
 2146:     F = fun({N,P,Opts,E}, BadL) ->
 2147:                 %% io:format("Testing ~p~n", [P]),
 2148:                 Return = Fun(Config, P, Opts),
 2149:                 %% The result should be the same when enabling maybe ... end
 2150:                 %% (making 'else' a keyword instead of an atom).
 2151:                 Return = Fun(Config, P, [{feature,maybe_expr,enable}|Opts]),
 2152:                 case message_compare(E, Return) of
 2153:                     true ->
 2154:                         case E of
 2155:                             {errors, Errors} ->
 2156:                                 call_format_error(Errors);
 2157:                             {warnings, Errors} ->
 2158:                                 call_format_error(Errors);
 2159:                             _ ->
 2160:                                 ok
 2161:                         end,
 2162:                         BadL;
 2163:                     false ->
 2164:                         io:format("~nTest ~p failed. Expected~n  ~p~n"
 2165:                                   "but got~n  ~p~n", [N, E, Return]),
 2166: 			fail()
 2167:                 end
 2168:         end,
 2169:     lists:foldl(F, [], TestsWithOpts).
 2170: 
 2171: check_test(Config, Test, Opts) ->
 2172:     Filename = "epp_test.erl",
 2173:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2174:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, Filename),
 2175:     ok = file:write_file(File, Test),
 2176:     case epp:parse_file(File, [{includes, PrivDir}| Opts]) of
 2177: 	{ok,Forms} ->
 2178: 	    Errors = [E || E={error,_} <- Forms],
 2179: 	    call_format_error([E || {error,E} <- Errors]),
 2180: 	    Errors;
 2181: 	{error,Error} ->
 2182: 	    Error
 2183:     end.
 2184: 
 2185: compile_test(Config, Test0, Opts0) ->
 2186:     Test = [<<"-module(epp_test). ">>, Test0],
 2187:     Filename = "epp_test.erl",
 2188:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2189:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, Filename),
 2190:     ok = file:write_file(File, Test),
 2191:     Opts = [export_all,nowarn_export_all,return,nowarn_unused_record,{outdir,PrivDir}] ++ Opts0,
 2192:     case compile_file(File, Opts) of
 2193:         {ok, Ws} -> warnings(File, Ws);
 2194:         {errors, Errors}=Else ->
 2195:             call_format_error(Errors),
 2196:             Else;
 2197:         Else -> Else
 2198:     end.
 2199: 
 2200: warnings(File, Ws) ->
 2201:     case lists:append([W || {F, W} <- Ws, F =:= File]) of
 2202:         [] ->
 2203: 	    [];
 2204:         L ->
 2205: 	    call_format_error(L),
 2206: 	    {warnings, L}
 2207:     end.
 2208: 
 2209: compile_file(File, Opts) ->
 2210:     case compile:file(File, Opts) of
 2211:         {ok, _M, Ws} -> {ok, Ws};
 2212:         {error, FEs, []} -> {errors, errs(FEs, File), []};
 2213:         {error, FEs, [{File,Ws}]} -> {error, errs(FEs, File), Ws}
 2214:     end.
 2215: 
 2216: errs([{File,Es}|L], File) ->
 2217:     call_format_error(Es),
 2218:     Es ++ errs(L, File);
 2219: errs([_|L], File) ->
 2220:     errs(L, File);
 2221: errs([], _File) ->
 2222:     [].
 2223: 
 2224: %% Smoke test and coverage of format_error/1.
 2225: call_format_error([{_,M,E}|T]) ->
 2226:     _ = M:format_error(E),
 2227:     call_format_error(T);
 2228: call_format_error([]) ->
 2229:     ok.
 2230: 
 2231: epp_parse_file(File, Opts) ->
 2232:     case epp:parse_file(File, Opts) of
 2233:         {ok, Forms} ->
 2234:             {ok, unopaque_forms(Forms)};
 2235:         {ok, Forms, Other} ->
 2236:             {ok, unopaque_forms(Forms), Other}
 2237:     end.
 2238: 
 2239: unopaque_forms(Forms) ->
 2240:     [erl_parse:anno_to_term(Form) || Form <- Forms].
 2241: 
 2242: run_test(Config, Test0, Opts0) ->
 2243:     Test = [<<"-module(epp_test). -export([t/0]). ">>, Test0],
 2244:     Filename = "epp_test.erl",
 2245:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2246:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, Filename),
 2247:     ok = file:write_file(File, Test),
 2248:     Opts = [return, {i,PrivDir},{outdir,PrivDir}] ++ Opts0,
 2249:     {ok, epp_test, []} = compile:file(File, Opts),
 2250:     AbsFile = filename:rootname(File, ".erl"),
 2251: 
 2252:     case lists:member({feature, maybe_expr, enable}, Opts0) of
 2253:         false ->
 2254:             %% Run in node
 2255:             {module, epp_test} = code:load_abs(AbsFile, epp_test),
 2256:             Reply = epp_test:t(),
 2257:             code:purge(epp_test),
 2258:             Reply;
 2259:         true ->
 2260:             %% Run in peer with maybe_expr enabled
 2261:             {ok, Peer, Node} =
 2262:                 ?CT_PEER(#{args => ["-enable-feature","maybe_expr"],
 2263:                            connection => 0}),
 2264:             {module, epp_test} =
 2265:                 rpc:call(Node, code, load_abs, [AbsFile, epp_test]),
 2266:             Reply = rpc:call(Node, epp_test, t, []),
 2267:             peer:stop(Peer),
 2268:             Reply
 2269:     end.
 2270: 
 2271: fail() ->
 2272:     ct:fail(failed).
 2273: 
 2274: message_compare(T, T) ->
 2275:     T =:= T.
